item.title: Neural Networks Backpropagation: The back story
item.description:
I’ve been learning about Artificial Neural Networks, and recently watched this lecture after which I got a great intuition behind why backpropagation is used, and how it works. The key idea here is Mathematical Convenience.

The key idea is to
